entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Cannot create layout on unknown arch Loongarch #78854
    Future
  • Mono iOS disk size regression #78851
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: GetFunctionPointer for delegates #78846
  • [API Proposal]: String should implement IParsable<string> #78842

Closed

  • ExecutionEngineException when hooking/detouring GetSysColor() #78086
  • [NativeAOT] System.Numerics.Vectors test fails to compile with an assert. #78717
    8.0.0
  • Strange behavior between Release and Debug builds [Random access violations and null exceptions] #78839
  • ArgumentOutOfRangeException thrown for System.Text.Json with default buffer size #78856
  • Serialization of properties from inherited interfaces vs abstract base classes #41749
    8.0.0
  • Should `IDictionary<K, V>` return something that implements `IReadOnlySet<K>`? #78762
  • File Operation in Ubuntu 22.04 #76572
    Future
  • System.Runtime.CompilerServices.Unsafe is not obey .NET Standard 2.0 (it should support .NET Core 2.1 App) #77367
    Future
  • Multi-targeting logic in Source Generators in NuGet packages doesn't work transitively #60870
    6.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Could not load file or assembly System.Text.Json Version=7.0.0.0,or one of its dependencies. The located assembly's manifest definition does not match the assembly reference. (Exception from HRESULT: 0x80131040) #77988
  • Release-only build has errors due to ResolvedMatchingContract when re-compiling in Visual Studio #75897
    8.0.0
  • System.Text.Json serialization fails in .Net Framework for objects with a specify constructor #78844

PullRequests

Created

  • Do not overallocate SocketAddress.Buffer #78860
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • Add .NET 7 source gen regression tests #78857
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] This fixes Github issue 78206 - a heap corruption problem associated with mark stack overflow #78855
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [wasm][draft] make JSObject dynamic #78853
    arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • WIP: Implement native container types used by shared EventPipe code. #78852
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Exclude things which broken on Loongarch #78850
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [Android] Remove repeated calls to beginHandshake #78849
    area-System.Net.Security, os-android
  • [wasm][mt] making JSImport work on worker thread #78847
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0

Merged

  • Fix asserts in Vector<> #78765
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove SystemReflectionMetadataLoadContextVersion from Versions.prop #78848
  • Move the `[With|Get]Element(SIMD)` folding to local morph #76491
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • This fixes Github issue 78206 - a heap corruption problem associated with mark stack overflow #78756
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Update convention on how to ref and pack analyzers #78845
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add support for serializing properties in interface hierarchies #78788
    enhancement, area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Make DependencyGraphViewer a WinExe #78843
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Disable CG on Linux musl installer jobs too #78832
  • [mono][tests] Fix FullAOT DivToMul test #78816
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • JIT: Fold const RVA access (via const index) #78783
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2053331 #78677
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • CoreCLR initialization failures logging #78790
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • ci test #76081
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Refactoring tests to support both external and loopback servers #74579
    area-System.Net, 8.0.0
  • [mono] Add a managed cache for flags in RuntimeType. #78840
    area-CoreLib-mono
  • Fix ds-ipc-pal-socket.c Windows build. #77840
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • [Android] Improvements to remote certificate verification in SslStream #77386
    area-System.Net.Security, os-android, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Update a few dependencies #78710
  • [Android] Prevent exceptions with a 'Success' message in System.Net.NetworkInformation #78555
    area-System.Net, os-android
  • JIT: Set GTF_ORDER_SIDEEFF for some nodes with invisible dependencies #78698
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update assembly version from hardcoded to MajorVersion #78354
    NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure
  • [release/7.0] [wasm] propagate aborted startup to top most promise #78764
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-meta-mono, 7.0.2
  • Wasm jiterpreter cleanup and bug fixes pt. 3 #78782
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Enable basic Kept validation in NativeAOT running linker tests #78828
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Switch to the new ARM64 Helix queues #77764
    area-Infrastructure
  • [corlib] Move System.Reflection.Emit.SignatureHelper to the shared partition #77939
    area-System.Reflection
  • Fix Runtime_76194 test #78760
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Make sure s_currentGenerationTable is safe for profiler attach #78841
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • BitConverter.GetBytes is incompatible with INumber<T> #29240
  • dotnet workload install produces garbage output on non en-us systems. #29231
  • Publish app targeting runtime linux-armv6 fails #29228

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/7.0.2xx] tab completion to suggest only first from short name synonyms #29235
    Area-dotnet new

Merged

  • Template verifier adoption in CommonTemplateTests #28707
    Area-dotnet new, Area-Common templates
  • simplified conditions in C# class library template #29221
    Area-Infrastructure, Area-dotnet new

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2052965 #28957
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-25
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Discussion: Permit static lambda assignment to function pointers #3476

Updated

  • Proposal: Permit trailing commas in method signatures and invocations #391
    Backlog

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Expand `Use pattern matching` analyzer/codefix to suggest property patterns #65613
  • `GenerateDeconstructMethodCodeFixProvider` should support positional patterns #65612
  • Prevent auto removal of spaces between brackets #65610
  • csharp_style_pattern_matching_over_as_with_null_check incorrect results near labels and goto statements #65609
  • Comments should be aligned with the text below, not above. #65608
  • `Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Project.DefaultNamespace` is null for `sqlproj`. #65607

PullRequests

Created

  • Use ILegacyDocumentOptionsProvider if it is available #65614
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Move `DisambiguateSameVariableTests` to `VerifyCS` #65611
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Display standalone parameter names by default #65606
    Area-Compilers

Updated

  • Move "Unseal class" codefix to VerifyCS #65605
    Area-IDE, Community
  • [WIP] Implementation of new Visitors, Walkers and Rewriters as laid out in #62647 #65139
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • View Call Hierarchy - fix thread block (#65452) #65574
    Area-IDE
  • Bump mac editor and implement CocoaTextBufferVisibilityTracker #65568
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Emit `ParamArrayAttribute` for synthesized delegates #65533
    Area-Compilers
  • Support fine-grained diagnostic tagging. #65547
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Recognize FromQuery.Name when generating URL #45285
  • [Blazor Server] Sould I catch OperationCanceledException in OnParametersSetAsync/LifeCycle methods when cancelling Tasks inside it? #45282
  • Package not found error Blazor hosted wasm app while docker build #45281
  • Blazor Webassembly Dev Host returns 404 on URL with urlencoded url as path parameter #45279
  • Health Check issue with Microsoft.Extensions.Diagnostics.HealthChecks 7.0.0 running on net6.0 #45278
  • ASP.Net Core Thread Starvation in high load #45277
  • Perf improvement: plaintext, plainTextSansFilter #45276
  • [dotnet-sdk-7.0.101] System.Reflection.AmbiguousMatchException: 'Ambiguous match found.' #45275
  • Browser print RenderFragment performance issue #45272

Closed

  • MacOS Issues #45136
  • Custom Server Sent Event in ASPNET Core #42058
    Discussions
  • Failed to authenticate HTTPS connection #43752
    Discussions
  • `Microsoft.AspNetCore.RateLimiting` latest package is `7.0.0-rc.2.22476.2` #45283
  • Using app.Urls.Add in a hosted Blazor WASM project breaks WebAssembly debugging #43703
    Discussions
  • Route Group is a fantastic feature to streamline code towards maintenance over decades with steep climb #43759
    Discussions
  • Cannot get endpoint metadata from `IApiDescriptionGroupCollectionProvider` which added by `MapXXX().Add(...)` #43792
    Discussions

PullRequests

Created

  • Code analyzer to detect if route parameters are parsable #45286
    area-infrastructure
  • Run Selenium tests on Playwright via an adapter [experiment] #45284
  • gRPC JSON transcoding: Support deserializing non-nested enum from string #45273
    area-grpc

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2053219 #44686
    area-infrastructure
  • Caching.StackExchangeRedis: add "force reconnect" pattern #45261
  • Update selenium dependency versions #44834
  • HttpSys request headers Keys and Count both allocate #45156
    Perf, area-runtime, servers-httpsys, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CookieContainer doesnt work #11669
  • [IOS]Collection view "ItemsViewSource is Empty" error only on iOS #11666
  • Buttons behind "Pop-Up" are handling taps in Android, which is different than Windows behavior (and Xamarin) #11663
  • [Android] VisualState setter not working for Button BackgroundColor in release mode #11662
  • Resources/Images subfolder problem. #11661
  • [BUG] Border StrokeDash is not working on Android #11659
  • When two control views overlap, setting the opacity and TranslationY properties is invalid #11658
  • Android: Open App from background -> no shell navigation #11656
  • [Android] Label's HorizontalTextAlignment property is not updated properly at runtime #11655
  • Unable to change/set App Icon and Splash Screen for IOS #11654
  • MAUI App is there any tool from Microsoft which supports MAUI GUI Automation? #11650
  • Application Display Version With Build Number #11642

Closed

  • Mac Catalyst target cannot be removed #11584
  • Crash when using a ListView in a RelativeLayout #9590
  • Button ImageSource #11205
    Backlog
  • [iOS] Startup Crash Specific to iOS 12 and .Net 7 #11525
    Backlog
  • Will there be a window control library similar WPF in the future? #11595

PullRequests

Created

  • [Tizen] Add Shell FlyoutBackDrop #11647
    community ✨
  • [Tizen] Add handing Label.TextType #11646
    community ✨

Merged

  • [release/7.0.1xx-sr1.1] Add a condition to skip the AutoImport.props #11668
  • [net7.0] Add a condition to skip the AutoImport.props #11667
  • Add a condition to skip the AutoImport.props #11665
  • Stable version for 7.0.1xx-sr1.1 #11664
  • [net7.0] Only include MauiXaml/Css when $(UseMaui)=true #11653
  • [net7.0] Ensure no crashing for < iOS 12 due to PointerGesture incompatibility #11660
  • [net6.0] Only include MauiXaml/Css when $(UseMaui)=true #11652
  • Ensure no crashing for < iOS 12 due to PointerGesture incompatibility #11589
  • Only include MauiXaml/Css when $(UseMaui)=true #11638
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [net7.0] Update Essentials Connectivity API Docs #11633
    t/docs 📝

Updated

  • Make MAUI into 1 workload and lots of NuGets instead of a full workload #11206
    area/setup 🪄
  • [net7.0] [Tizen] Add handing Label.TextType #11612
    platform/tizen
  • [net7.0] [Tizen] Add Shell FlyoutBackDrop #11613
    platform/tizen
  • Update Essentials Compass API Docs #11414
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/essentials 🍞
  • [Build] Update yaml for net8 #11609
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Tizen] Add Shell SearchHandler #11597
    community ✨

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Issue with serialized Json Array/Lists #29677
  • [Performance] GetManyByKeys - Am I missing something? It´s fast! #29676
  • JsonColumns vs ExecuteUpdateAsync + custom serializer for JsonColums #29675

Closed

  • Using a ValueConverter instance for `PropertiesConfigurationBuilder.HaveConversion()` #29681
  • How to create custom database literal value converter #29674
  • Entity With 268 Property (Column) Memory Leak in Savechange #29655

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix bug where a non-sproc command comes before a sproc command #29680
  • SQLite: allow opting out of RETURNING for virtual tables #29679
  • Remove s from AppendInsertAndSelectOperations #29678

Updated

  • Support interfaces and entities with owned types in ExecuteUpdate setter property lambda #29672
  • Fix to #28648 - Json/Query: translate element access of a json array #29656

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-25
entry.content:
Issues

PullRequests
